Content.Text: <MYNAME>! <MYNAME>! It's me, Dunhill!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
Ah, sorry for waking you. This is Neil,
from the animal shop. We've got a bit of
a problem, actually...
<PAGE>
One of the wholesale cows he purchased
for retail has escaped. Could you help
us search for her?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
If she isn't here, she must have gone
toward the forest!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
That sounds likely. Let's go and take a
look. Sorry, can you come along?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
No sign of the cow here... Where's she
got to?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
This is an animal we're talking about.
We'd better split up and widen the
search.
<PAGE>
Neil, you can go back to the shop. She
may already be back there. I'll go and
check the river.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
Yeah, okay.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
<MYNAME>, can you look further in here?
She might have wandered deeper in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
I see... she wasn't over there either?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
Nothing. Where'd she go?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
There! That's her! You found her?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
<MYNAME>, great work!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
Sorry, I haven't introduced myself yet,
have I? I'm Neil. As you can see, I sell
animals.
<PAGE>
You'll need livestock in your line of
work, won't you? I've been off buying
them up, and just got back yesterday.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
Neil sells animals from the Plaza.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
That's how it works.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
If you need animals, then come to the
Plaza.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
I need to thank you somehow... here,
how about these.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
Here's something. Take this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
You can have them.

You got blueprints for the barn and the
coop!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
You'll need these to keep animals on
your farm. Once you build a <RED>barn</RED> come
over to my shop for an animal.
<PAGE>
I guess you don't have any cash yet,
either, do you? So I'll start you out
for free.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
Hah hah hah! Great. Now you're finally
starting to look like a farm.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
I'll go and open up the shop. See you
later.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT>
I'll take my leave too. Great work
today.

<POS_CENTER>
Now I can keep animals! Let's get these
new buildings up quickly.
